title: Software Engineer
summary: I’m a 5+ years Software Engineer, with strong skills in backend development. I define myself as a quick learner, goal-oriented, and team worker. Since the beginning of 2018 I’ve been devoted to learning and working with AWS stack technologies, I’m certified as an AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate and AWS Certified Developer - Associate.

certifications.title: Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 8 Programmer

roles.title: Engineering Manager
roles.description: Accountable of supporting the team to achieve business goals and personal fulfillment at work, increasing the overall throughput by reducing lead time​ and cost. Increase the efficiency of the systems​ by proactively identifying and correcting wastes in our processes.

roles.title: Agile Java Developer
roles.description: In charge of the creation of apps that integrate multiple platforms using AWS technologies and python as a first language while taking advantage of SCRUM methodology to deliver fast and iterative software.

roles.title: Project Lead
roles.description: In charge of planning, take decissions about the technology to used and manage projects with a software development team with abilities to build web applications. This job position requires to have knowledges of the technology used such as Java 8, Spring 4, Hibernate, J2EE, Oracle DB, Weblogic and be able to write the code if neccessary.

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.description: In charge of building applications for public entities working with backend (J2EE, Srping, Hibernate, OracleDB) and frontend (ExtJs) through REST web services. Responsible of applying good design patterns allowing the increment of software easier and faster on each iteration.

roles.title: Project Lead
roles.description: Project engineer with interest on design and develop of software components responsible for managing the logic and systems integration, that allow communicate web and mobile applications with the data sources of a business. With experiences developing REST/SOAP web services in Java and design and modeling of data for SQL and No-SQL databases.

roles.title: Sap Consultant
roles.description: ABAP and Portal Consultant with interest of developing ABAP programs that can be use at a high level for other departments and also with abilities to install and migrate a Portal SAP system.

roles.title: Web programmer
roles.description: In charge of developing web services using the framework Django used for a e-commerce web site
